summary: The space tag encompasses resources exploring concepts that transcend traditional spatial and temporal boundaries. This includes evolving ideas of ecosystems, particularly in the context of decentralized and internet-based communities. Central to this theme is the notion of 'Ecosystem Architecture,' emphasizing less hierarchical and more organic organizational models.
excerpt: Explores the evolution of the term ecosystem from its biological roots to its expanded meaning in human organizations, advocating for Ecosystem Architecture to foster decentralized communities.
